title: Foundation Established
description: Divyansh Gaur established Aatman Foundation with a vision to bridge traditional wisdom with modern challenges and create positive social impact.

title: First Service Initiative
description: Launched our first community service by providing food at Seva Ashram, marking the beginning of our commitment to serving those in need.

title: Tree Plantation Drive
description: Organized our first environmental conservation initiative with a tree plantation drive, contributing to a greener future for our community.

title: School Education Program
description: Conducted yoga, hygiene, and self-awareness sessions at government schools, empowering students with holistic education and life skills.

title: Diwali Community Initiative
description: Launched initiatives to purchase diyas from local vendors and introduced reflective band programs, supporting local artisans during the festival of lights.

title: Holi Donation Drive
description: Organized a special donation drive during Holi, spreading joy and colors while supporting community welfare initiatives.

title: Kids Rangotsav
description: Hosted a vibrant Rangotsav event for children at Karni Singh Stadium, celebrating creativity, culture, and community spirit through art and festivities.

title: Yoga Flow Series Launch
description: Launched our comprehensive Yoga Flow Series initiative, making ancient wellness practices accessible to communities and promoting holistic well-being.
